songs.title: Ni nachleh
songs.lyrics:
Balle balle kehke oh nachdi
Haaye tera tapna, Haaye tera nachna
Shaava shaava kehke oh nachdi
Haaye tera tapna, Haaye tera nachna

Addiyaan chak ke
Ni lakk nu ghumaavein
Pairi ni panjebaan paake
Nachke vakhaavein
Boliyaan main paavaan
Tere samne ni aake
Ek thumka tera ni pooray club nu hilaave

Sohne sajna ve ik gal das na
Kaavein tu sharmaave
Jadon samne hovaan
Chad de tu saare gham
Mehbooba meri bann
Saara kuch bhull ke
Tu saade naal nach, nachleh
Saade samne tu billo raaniye, Ni nachleh
Tere uttey assi jaan vaariye, Ni nachleh
Ni tere pichhay rull jaanviye, Ni nachleh

Akhiyaan nu laundi oh surma
Haaye tera turna, Haaye tera mudna
Akhiyaan nu laundi oh surma
Haaye tera turna, Haaye tera mudna

Lambe kaalay vaal tere
Lagde kamaal ve
Saadi hai tu zindagi
Saadi jind jaan ve
Shehar vich aake ni
Tu paaye ni bhuchaal ve
Tera husn hai katal karaave

Sohne sajna ve ik gal ni sehnaa
Kaavein tu sharmaave
Jadon samne hovaan
Chad de tu saare gham
Mehbooba meri bann
Saara kuch bhull ke
Tu saade naal nach, nachleh
Saade samne tu billo raaniye, Ni nachleh
Tere uttey assi jaan vaariye, Ni nachleh
Ni tere pichhay rull jaanviye, Ni nachleh

Sohne sajna ve ik gal ni sehnaa
Kaavein tu sharmaave
Jadon samne hovaan
Chad de tu saare gham
Mehbooba meri bann
Saara kuch bhull ke
Tu saade naal nach, nachleh
Saade samne tu billo raaniye, Ni nachleh
Tere uttey assi jaan vaariye, Ni nachleh
Ni tere pichhay rull jaanviye, Ni nachleh

Ni nachleh
Saade samne tu billo raaniye, Ni nachleh
Tere uttey assi jaan vaariye, Ni nachleh
Ni tere pichhay rull jaanviye, Ni nachleh
